docs.text: Leeds BAG — Wiki / Home Welcome — this site holds how-to guides, templates, and resources for the Leeds BAG research group. Quick links - How to contribute: Contributing - Example guide: Example how-to If you'd rather edit in the GitHub wiki, see the migration notes below. Migration notes This branch copies content from the GitHub wiki (leeds-bag/bag_wiki.wiki) into docs/. Images have been moved into docs/images/ where possible and links updated. If you find any broken image or page links, please flag them in the PR. Welcome to the BAG Wiki! What is this for? A wiki for BAG to share IT/python FAQs and tips. Useful content you could add... - Computer resources are available and how to access them - Useful python scripts that are generally useful (e.g. regridding, making maps) - Add questions and answers from the 'IT and coding help' Teams channel
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Contributing Thank you for contributing! Use this short checklist: Create or update a Markdown file in docs/ Use headings and short sections for readability Add images to docs/images/ and reference with relative paths Submit a branch and open a PR against main Suggested PR title format: "docs: add/modify " Template for a new how-to: # Short title ## Why Brief reason / context. ## Steps 1. Step one 2. Step two ## Notes - Extra tips or links
docs.title: Contributing
